text:
Interesting article featuring the photos of one of our clients/friends Susan Meiselas 
<http://lens.blogs.nytimes.com/2016/10/31/behind-the-mask-scenes-from-nicaraguas-sandinista-revolution/?_r=0>
tied to the re-release of her landmark photo book Nicaragua that includes a forward by our other Magnum client/friend Kristen Lubben
